code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Sidebar from"@components/library/Sidebar";import{Outlet,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import MobileSidebar from"@components/library/Sidebar/MobileSidebar";import{Header}from"@components/layout/Header";import{useTheme}from"@mui/material/styles";import useMediaQuery from"@mui/material/useMediaQuery";import{Footer}from"@components/layout/Footer";import UserData from"@helpers/userData";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{PreviewLoader,TransferPopup}from"@components/library";import{ConnectionToSockets}from"@components/common/ConnectionToSockets";import{NO_FOOTER_PAGES}from"@constants";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LayoutWithAside=()=>{const theme=useTheme();const location=useLocation();const[sidebarOpen,setSidebarOpen]=useState(false);const isDesktop=useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.up("md"));const{loading}=useSelector(state=>state.user);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserData,{}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PreviewLoader,{loading:loading}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ConnectionToSockets,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"base-wrap",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"base-wrap__header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{setSidebar:setSidebarOpen})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"base-wrap__content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"main-content",children:[isDesktop?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{open:sidebarOpen,setOpen:setSidebarOpen}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MobileSidebar,{open:sidebarOpen,setOpen:setSidebarOpen}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main-content__wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Outlet,{})})]})}),!NO_FOOTER_PAGES.includes(location.pathname)&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"base-wrap__footer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TransferPopup,{})]})]});};export default LayoutWithAside;
